Foyer.description: You are in the dusty foyer of a spooky old mansion. A grand staircase leads up, but it's blocked by rubble. A single door stands to the north.

Library.description: You've entered a musty library lined with shelves of ancient, decaying books. In the center of the room sits a large, locked chest. A door leads south.

Secret Room.description: A hidden room filled with cobwebs and a pile of treasure! The only exit is west back to the Library.

puzzles.success: You place the key in the lock and turn it. The chest clicks open!

actions.message: A secret door slides open to the east!

puzzles.success: You drink the poison. Uh oh...
puzzles.end_summary: You have died. Thanks for playing!
